<h3 id="X39898">X(39898) = ORTHOLOGIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: 5th MIXTILINEAR TO 9th BROCARD</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^6+2*(b+c)*a^5-(3*b^2+4*b*c+3*c^2)*a^4+4*(b+c)*b*c*a^3+(3*b^2+2*b*c+3*c^2)*(b-c)^2*a^2-2*(b^4-c^4)*(b-c)*a-(b^4-c^4)*(b^2-c^2)  :  :

<br>
<b>X(39898) = 3*X(1)-2*X(39870) = 3*X(1)-X(39878) = 2*X(6)-3*X(5603) = 2*X(40)-3*X(10519) = 4*X(141)-3*X(5657) = 4*X(182)-5*X(3616) = 4*X(946)-3*X(14853) = 4*X(1385)-3*X(25406) = 4*X(1386)-5*X(10595) = 4*X(1386)-3*X(14912) = 7*X(3090)-6*X(38047) = 4*X(3098)-3*X(9778) = 5*X(3618)-6*X(5886) = 7*X(3619)-6*X(26446) = 7*X(3622)-6*X(38029) = 2*X(3751)-3*X(14853) = 3*X(6776)-4*X(39870) = 3*X(6776)-2*X(39878) = 5*X(10595)-3*X(14912) = 3*X(11180)-2*X(39885)</b>
<p>
The reciprocal orthologic center of these triangles is X(4).</p>
<p>X(39898) lies on these lines: {1,6776}, {4,518}, {6,5603}, {8,1352}, {40,10519}, {55,39883}, {56,39877}, {69,517}, {141,5657}, {145,5921}, {182,3616}, {511,962}, {515,16496}, {519,11180}, {542,3241}, {611,3485}, {944,1503}, {946,3751}, {952,18440}, {1350,6361}, {1351,22791}, {1385,25406}, {1386,10595}, {1469,4295}, {1482,3564}, {1537,10759}, {1992,3656}, {2098,39897}, {2099,39873}, {3056,30305}, {3090,38047}, {3098,9778}, {3416,12245}, {3475,7413}, {3618,5886}, {3619,26446}, {3622,38029}, {3624,38118}, {3654,21356}, {3873,26118}, {4301,34379}, {4430,37456}, {4663,38035}, {5050,5901}, {5182,11724}, {5597,39881}, {5598,39880}, {5604,39888}, {5605,39887}, {5622,11735}, {5693,34378}, {5758,10477}, {5790,18358}, {5800,10532}, {5818,10516}, {5846,15069}, {5847,7982}, {5848,10698}, {5928,17642}, {6905,12329}, {6906,22769}, {7967,39874}, {7968,39875}, {7969,39876}, {7987,33750}, {8148,11898}, {8192,39879}, {8210,39895}, {8211,39896}, {8550,38315}, {9041,34627}, {9624,38049}, {9779,19130}, {9780,24206}, {9812,31670}, {9997,39882}, {10247,39899}, {10800,39872}, {10944,39889}, {10950,39890}, {11179,38314}, {11396,39871}, {11910,39886}, {12017,38028}, {12261,25320}, {12589,18391}, {12672,34381}, {13464,16475}, {13902,19145}, {13959,19146}, {14927,18481}, {17257,31394}, {17316,31395}, {17625,26929}, {18493,18583}, {18525,39884}, {21554,38053}, {28174,33878}, {28538,34631}, {35810,39893}, {35811,39894}</p>
<p>
X(39898) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {145, 5921}, {8148, 11898}<br>
X(39898) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (8, 1352), (944, 3242), (1351, 22791), (1992, 3656), (3751, 946), (6361, 1350), (6776, 1), (10759, 1537), (12245, 3416), (14927, 18481), (18525, 39884), (39878, 39870)<br>
X(39898) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (1, 39878, 39870), (946, 3751, 14853), (10595, 14912, 1386), (24206, 38116, 9780), (39870, 39878, 6776), (39902, 39903, 6776)<br>
</p>
